meanings.definition: The dense fibrous membrane that covers the outer surface of the skull.
meanings.sent1: The pericranium protects the skull from harm.
meanings.sent2: Doctors carefully examined the pericranium during the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The pericranium seemed to be playing hide-and-seek with the doctors.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the pericranium covering the skull.
meanings.sent5: The pericranium felt like a shield, guarding the skull.

meanings.definition: The tough outer layer of tissue surrounding the brain.
meanings.sent1: The pericranium provides a sturdy shield for the brain.
meanings.sent2: Injuries to the head can affect the pericranium surrounding the brain.
meanings.sent3: The pericranium around the brain seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as tough as the pericranium protecting the brain.
meanings.sent5: The pericranium around the brain felt like a fortress, keeping it safe.
